snippet.title: Rivensin Sanctified Gameplay
snippet.description:
Gameplay of the first level displaying the updated sword combat mechanics which utilize light, medium, and heavy attacks along with finishing moves.  Learn more about the game at:
https://www.moddb.com/mods/ruiner
follow on tumblr @ rivensin.com
